---
name: Maintenance Report
about: Report maintenance or housekeeping tasks
title: "Maintenance: "
labels: maintenance
assignees: ""

---

**Description**
A clear and concise description of the maintenance task.

**Scope**
What parts of the project does this maintenance affect?

**Impact**
What is the expected impact of this maintenance (e.g., performance improvements, code cleanup, dependency updates)?

**Additional Context**
Add any other context or details about the maintenance task here.
